inclusion.criterion: Adults with age of 20 years old or above
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Free of active urinary tract infection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Free of bladder outlet obstruction on enrollment
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients should have severe dysuria or urinary retention, large residual urine and
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: have been treated with medication or other therapeutic modality for over 3 months
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with severe cardiopulmonary disease and such as congestive heart failure,
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: arrhythmia, poorly controlled hypertension, not able to receive regular follow-up.
exclusion.label: triggers
